text: [Music]
I've been passionate about autonomous
vehicles for ey so it was something that
was lingering in my mind for for some
time
[Music]
i'm daniele I'm a Solutions Architect
with AWS based in London now our product
is an intelligent robotic lawn mower
it's very similar to the existing
robotic vacuum cleaner that you may use
the term but instead of working around
your house you're living film it goes
around your garden mowing the lawn as it
goes along
and try to detect any obstacles avoid
them and work around them and we have
the Intel board that runs our frame for
us for software we use that to talk to
the robot the more where that goes
around we use AWS IOT to get the data
from the sensor and push it on to the
AWS cloud from there we use kinetise
fire hose to ingest the data and blend
it on to pay for thermal and storage and
also on an elastic search service for us
to do some kind of visualization using
the Cabana dashboard we're also using a
lambda function running on on the green
grass core device to do the object
recognition and we use legs for the
voice interface to talk to the robot AWS
is the best platform for these kind of
projects it gives you the flexibility of
testing things really quickly and if it
doesn't work just move on to the next it
also provides most of the building
blocks that we use for our solution so
it was very easy for us to set
everything up and get started very
quickly
you
[Music]
